name: INDULGE YOURSELF IN YOUR OWN WAY AT VUNG TAU
description: Asking any foreigners who are living at Vung Tau if they are happy, the answer will be "Yes, I am". So what makes this small city attracting & sexy in its own way? Because of beautiful beaches, spectacular mountains, delicious seafood or just fresh weather here? Well, Vung Tau has them all. Vung Tau is famous for oil & gas industry, but not many foreigners know about this pearl. So why don't you come to discover, to dive yourself into the fresh sea water, to walk over 1000 steps up to a mountain where a 32 meters length statue of Jesus Christ stands, to sea breath-taking views from high. And more importantly, to see how much it worth living here.
